text: @AHRQ_Diversity #DiagnosticSafety #QualityCare #HealthEquity🚨New research reveals the alarming rate of diagnostic errors! 💉👀 Did you know that incorrect diagnoses affect 1 in 20 adults? 😱 It's time to take action and prioritize #DiagnosticSafety! 🔍💡 Let's work together to prevent errors and ensure quality care for all. 💪🏽👨‍⚕️👩‍⚕️
